title: Friends and other people
creator_contributor_role: Centre for Study of Higher Education, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Behavior therapy
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Handicapped
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Handicapped - Family relationships
description: A teaching model used to educate the intellectually disabled about types of relationships, clarifying social norms and behavioural expectations,in order to deal with loneliness, low self esteem and vulnerability to exploitation. Includes a booklet by Susie Smith and Judi Gray.
